text: Hattie Helen Gould Beck (or Sally Rand; April 3, 1904 â€“ August 31, 1979) was an American actress and dancer. She starred in many silent movies and in movies with sound. Her movies included The Dressmaker from Paris and The Road to Yesterday, both in 1925. Other movies followed. Rand was born in Missouri. She died due to congestive heart failure at seventy-five. title: Sally Rand
